explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning methods, specifically support vector machines (SVMs) and neural networks (NNs), for predicting foreign currency exchange rates.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper uses support vector machines (SVMs) as one of the machine learning methods for exchange rate prediction.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is used in the paper for exchange rate prediction.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of neural networks (NNs) as one of the machine learning methods for predicting exchange rates.
